label: Swaying
description: Speaker sways side to side or rocks while standing; distracting and suggests lack of poise.
scoring_guidance: Deduct in Delivery under posture or body control. Severe swaying = significant deduction; minimal = small deduction.

label: Purpose statement
description: Clear statement of the speech goal (e.g. 'Today I will explain...', 'My goal is to persuade you that...').
example_excerpt: Today I will explain three benefits of regular exercise.
scoring_guidance: Credit in Content / organization or introduction. Strong purpose statement = full or near-full points; missing or vague = deduct.

label: Strong eye contact
description: Speaker looks at the audience or camera regularly; does not read from notes for extended periods.
scoring_guidance: Credit in Delivery / eye contact. Sustained eye contact = full points; frequent reading from notes or looking away = deduct.
